notes

here is a collection of my notes, both for school and technical, organized in the best i am able to organize it.

technical

  • rust programming
    i try my best to write as much documentation as possible for the rust programming language. this is my cheat sheet that covers a majority of core Rust programming. this markdown document covers many many topics, and it's a great resource for quick refreshing. includes topics in ownership, lifetime and borrowing. source code also available. of course, this repo will be updated as i jump more in depth.

school

  • ap world history
    this includes all of my assignments that i have completed, as well as outlines that i rely on, and miscellaneous study guides and flash card sets. i don't recommend utilizing my homework as your own, because tha is definitely one way to not get a 4 or 5.
